board_of_directors.description: The Board of Directors provides strategic oversight, ensures ethical compliance, and aligns Touched Hearts with international NGO standards. Comprising 5-7 external experts in finance, law, and development, plus one team representative, the board drives accountability and transparency.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Board Chair, an expert in international development, leads strategic governance, ensuring Touched Hearts’ mission aligns with global standards. Their leadership fosters transparency and sustainable growth.

members.name: Solomon Ssekiranda (Representative)
members.bio: As Executive Director and board liaison, Solomon ensures alignment between operational and governance objectives, leveraging his strategic expertise.

members.name: Solomon Ssekiranda
members.bio: Solomon Ssekiranda, a strategic visionary with a B.Ed. from Makerere University and ongoing MBChB studies at Kabale University, drives Touched Hearts’ transformative education and healthcare initiatives. Formerly Vice President of FUMSA, he secured high-impact partnerships and led pioneering projects, ensuring sustainable community outcomes through rigorous leadership and data-driven strategies.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Deputy Director supports strategic operations, oversees departmental coordination, and ensures resilience in leadership. With expertise in NGO management, they drive scalable, impactful programs globally.

members.name: Judith Nahwera
members.bio: Judith Nahwera, a community development specialist, designs scalable, sustainable programs for Touched Hearts. Her expertise in grassroots mobilization and strategic partnerships drives measurable impact in underserved communities. Through meticulous program evaluation and localized solutions, Judith ensures initiatives deliver long-term, transformative benefits with exceptional efficiency and stakeholder trust.

members.name: Robinson Byamukama
members.bio: Robinson Byamukama, an MBChB candidate at Kabale University, spearheads Touched Hearts’ health programs with unparalleled expertise. As former FUMSA President, he engineered impactful health campaigns and cross-sector collaborations, reducing disparities in underserved regions. His precision in community engagement ensures scalable, evidence-based interventions that transform public health outcomes.

members.name: Stanley Okecho
members.bio: Stanley Okecho optimizes Touched Hearts’ operations with exceptional organizational acumen and strategic communication expertise. His advanced training in community development enables seamless coordination of complex initiatives. By streamlining processes and amplifying stakeholder engagement, Stanley ensures operational excellence and transparent, impactful communication aligned with global NGO standards.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Finance Officer ensures robust financial management, compliance, and transparent reporting. With expertise in nonprofit accounting, they safeguard Touched Hearts’ fiscal integrity and support sustainable growth.

members.name: Farouk Jjingo
members.bio: Farouk Jjingo, MBChB (Mbarara University), pioneers Touched Hearts’ technological advancements. Founding CareWave+ and EcoSpin, he develops telemedicine and sustainability solutions that redefine rural empowerment. His expertise in digital health and scalable innovation delivers inclusive, high-impact programs, positioning Touched Hearts as a leader in transformative NGO technology.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Head of Communications and Fundraising drives donor engagement, branding, and global outreach. With expertise in nonprofit marketing, they secure sustainable funding and amplify Touched Hearts’ mission through strategic campaigns.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The MEL Coordinator tracks program impact, ensuring data-driven decisions and donor accountability. Their expertise in evaluation methodologies strengthens Touched Hearts’ evidence-based approach and global credibility.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Volunteer Coordinator recruits, trains, and manages volunteers, fostering community trust and participation. Their expertise in grassroots engagement supports Touched Hearts’ mission of localized, impactful change.
